Content:: The 16th edition of Strade Bianche was held on 5 March 2022. It was the third event of the 2022 UCI World Tour. Twenty-two teams participated in the race, seventeen UCI WorldTeams and five UCI ProTeams. UCI WorldTeams UCI ProTeams Starting and finishing in Siena the course covers 184 kilometres (114 mi). It includes 63 kilometres (39 mi) of gravel over eleven sectors.[1]  This cycling race-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: 2022 Strade Bianche - Wikipedia
